game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a Chronomancer tasked with repairing the fabric of reality. A cataclysmic event known as "The Great Dissonance" has shattered the timestream, causing echoes of past, present, and future to converge in the mortal realm.
game.beginning: The game begins in a mystical library where the player's character is first introduced as a novice Chronomancer. The player is tasked with seeking out fragments of lost knowledge scattered throughout the world, which will aid them in their quest to repair time.
game.ending: After traversing realms both ancient and unknown, the player finally reaches the heart of the timestream: the Eternal Clockwork. Here, they engage a powerful entity known as "The Timekeeper," a being who has manipulated events from behind the scenes to prevent reality's destruction by any means necessary.
